short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Upload combat logs from within Pardus (a MMORPG set in space) and send them to an Infocenter to view later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The Pardus Infocenter Combat Uploader can be configured to send combat logs to a remote Infocenter. It can do this automatically (as you view the combat log) or it can be done using a button you need to manually click. Either way your combat logs are uploaded to the Infocenter you have configured for whatever universe you are playing in within Pardus (a MMORPG set in space).

This comes pre-configured with Orion XCOM Infocenter, Artemis Federation Infocenter and Pegasus Union Infocenter details (which can be edited).
